text: The Kid from Brooklyn is a 1946 American musical comedy movie directed by Norman Z. McLeod and was a remake of the 1936 movie The Milky Way. It stars Danny Kaye, Virginia Mayo, Vera-Ellen, Steve Cochran, Eve Arden, Walter Abel and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1946 comedy movies Category:1940s American musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Norman Z. McLeod
title: The Kid from Brooklyn
